mapper.select: SELECT i.INDICA_CD, count(id.prod_order_detail_cd) as prodCount, i.INDICA_DT FROM INDICA i JOIN INDICA_DTL id ON i.indica_cd = id.indica_cd WHERE i.indica_complete = 'N' GROUP BY i.INDICA_CD, i.INDICA_DT

SELECT id.prod_order_detail_cd, b.prdt_nm, id.BOM_CD ,i.indica_cd, id.edcts_cd, id.indica_cnt, id.wk_fr_dt, id.indica_dtl_complete FROM INDICA i JOIN INDICA_DTL id ON i.indica_cd = id.indica_cd JOIN bom b ON id.bom_cd = b.bom_cd WHERE id.indica_cd = #{indicaCd} and id.indica_dtl_complete ='N'

SELECT pp.prod_order_detail_cd, pr.prcs_nm, pp.prcs_cd , pp.prcs_pr, pp.prcs_stock, pp.rpcs_cnt ,vi.rsc_cd, vi.oust_cnt,id.indica_cnt, id.wk_fr_dt, pp.complete, b.PRDT_NM, b.bom_cd, pp.prcs_error_cnt FROM PRCS_PROG pp JOIN indica_dtl id ON pp.prod_order_detail_cd = id.prod_order_detail_cd JOIN prcs pr ON pp.prcs_cd = pr.prcs_cd JOIN v_prodBom vi ON id.bom_cd = vi.bom_cd AND pp.prcs_pr = vi.eq_sq JOIN bom b ON vi.bom_cd = b.bom_cd WHERE pp.prod_order_detail_cd = #{prodOrderDetailCd} ORDER BY pp.prcs_pr
SELECT PRCS_CD, PRCS_NM, EQM_CD, EQM_NM, EQM_YN FROM EQM WHERE PRCS_CD = #{prcsCd} AND EQM_YN = 'N'
select vp.BOM_CD, vp.PRCS_CD ,r.RSC_NM, vp.RSC_CD, vp.OUST_CNT from v_prodBom vp JOIN rsc r ON vp.RSC_CD = r.RSC_CD WHERE vp.BOM_CD = #{bomCd} AND vp.PRCS_CD = #{prcsCd}

SELECT id.prod_order_detail_cd, b.prdt_nm, id.BOM_CD ,i.indica_cd, id.edcts_cd, id.indica_cnt, id.wk_fr_dt, id.indica_dtl_complete, pp.RPCS_CNT FROM INDICA i JOIN INDICA_DTL id ON i.indica_cd = id.indica_cd JOIN bom b ON id.bom_cd = b.bom_cd JOIN prcs_prog pp ON pp.prod_order_detail_cd = id.prod_order_detail_cd WHERE id.indica_cd = #{indicaCd} and id.indica_dtl_complete ='Y' and prcs_cd = 'PRCS1006'
